features: Feature Rich Premium Webcam: 1080p HD video with electronic pan, tilt and 4x zoom so you always look your best. Backlight compensation, true color hue saturation, and autofocus ensuring accurate, sharp, life-like images.
Security Features: Integrated privacy shutter makes sure you’re in control of when you are sending video, with quick reminders from video mute/unmute LED indicator.
Seamless Set-up: Easy USB-A connection has you up and running in seconds. Pair with Poly headset or USB speakerphone for a complete audio and video experience.
Flexible: Included mount easily attaches to top of laptop or monitor, underneath your display, on a wall, or to a tripod.
Compatibility: Works with all leading video conferencing services, such as Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet and many more.
body.description: BIG PERFORMANCE. SMALL PACKAGE. Crisp, clear video is the perfect complement to Poly’s superior sound. Now you can get it in a camera built for small spaces. The EagleEye Mini USB camera adds business-class HD video to computers and conference room solutions—pair it with the Trio 8800, Trio 8500, VoxBox or VVX 501/601. Better camera, better collaboration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compact USB Webcam, Poly EagleEye Mini Feature rich mini camera: Optimized for use in personal and small room environments - including high definition 1080p video, electronic pan, tilt and 4x zoom for an image that remains at its highest capable resolution even when fully zoomed.

Product Information Security Features Integrated privacy shutter prevents unintentional use of your camera. Includes a video mute/unmute LED indicator. Video Resolution Expect true color hue saturation, backlight compensation, and autofocus optimized for smaller environments ensuring accurate, sharp, life-like images. Seamless Set-up Easy USB connection has you up and running in seconds. Pair with a Poly headset or USB speakerphone for a complete audio and video experience. Compatibility Compatible with all leading cloud video solutions.
Use Cases In the Office For use in personal workspaces. At Home For use in home offices. On the Go Get up and running in seconds with Plug and Play setup.

Poly Innovation Poly creates premium audio and video products so you can have your best meeting -- anywhere, anytime, every time. Our headsets, video and audio-conferencing products, desk phones, analytics software and services are beautifully designed and engineered to connect people with incredible clarity. They're pro-grade, easy to use and work seamlessly with all the best video and audio conferencing services. With Poly (Plantronics, Inc. – formerly Plantronics and Polycom), you'll do more than just show up, you'll stand out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A significant upgrade over built-in cameras
reviews.reviewText: So I haven't done any sort of survey of dedicated cameras - I can't say if this is the best of its type (though it was recommended to me as such by someone I trust). But I can say that it's a dramatic improvement over the cameras that are built in to my latest-generation MacBook Air and my several-year old Mac desktop. The resolution is radically better. The light balance and low-light performance are far better. And the focus and depth-of-field handling are far better. I am on zoom calls typically 5-6 hours a day, these days. (Ugh, right?) I find that being seen clearly really helps my participation and impact in meetings. Mostly, it's about enabling the other people on the calls to more easily read my facial expressions. It actually makes a difference. If you also have a zoom-heavy job, make the investment, upgrade your camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works flawlessly with MS TEAMS
reviews.reviewText: As I have started working from home, and absolutely hate the integrated cameras in both my work tablet and my personal laptop, I had a cheap webcam to use for work. When work migrated to Microsoft TEAMS platform, it wouldn't recognize my cheap camera even though all other apps did. Did the research and found that this camera would integrate with TEAMS... it works flawlessly, great video, great color... Couldn't be happier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great camera. However, no zoom feature on Zoom. Poly tech support weak.
reviews.reviewText: Bought my EagleEye Mini to use primarily in Zoom meetings to work remotely (bought elsewhere). Poly's website talks about 4x zoom & pan feature....but it must be very app specific as it doesn't appear to have that functionality in Zoom. Talking to Polycom's tech support for this camera is amazingly weak given that tech support for their Plantronic's headsets is actually very good. Camera is good unless you want that zoom function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with my 2020 Mac mini
reviews.reviewText: Very nice, and works well with my 2020 Mac mini(macOS Big Sur, version 11.3.1)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great image quality, terrible mount for PCs
reviews.reviewText: The video is great quality but the mount is pretty useless. The camera has limited range of motion (up/down only) so if you want to rotate the camera left or right, you're out of luck. I was trying to hide closet doors in my background and the only way I could do it was to bend the mount and use some tape. Neither the mount nor the camera offering physical panning which seems really strange to me.Other reviewers mentioned zooming. I was able to get that to work in Windows 10 by opening the Camera app and zooming in by using Ctrl + or Ctrl + wheel up on the mouse. I also turned off the autofocus there to avoid the constant refocusing. Once I have it the way you want, simply close out of the app and open Teams/Zoom/whatever and it should be tuned the same as it was in the Camera app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great web Camera - provides great pictures
reviews.reviewText: Great Camera for web chats- provides great pictures. Easy to install and use.
Plug and play on Mac and windows. Can’t get any easier than than.
Easy to install. Needs to upgrade firmware if starts reinitialize while using
The resolution of the camera is not good. Mobile phones has a better resolution.

reviews.reviewTitle: Poor quality. Stopped working on Day 7.
reviews.reviewText: Stopped working on the day the return window closed. Pathetic!
Ideal für Video Calls etc. Installation super einfach anstecken und loslegen. Bild Qualität überzeugt voll und ganz
